DataChallenge.2017
  • Reference

World Bank Poverty and Equity data set 2010-2016

Poverty and Equity Database.

data(pov)

Format

An object of class "data.table".

Source

World Bank Poverty and Equity archive

Examples

data(pov)
str(pov)
